name: Hedgeswarm
description:
Note: HTML5 export is buggy by the very nature of this being a 3d game with mouse capture. Downloading an executable is strongly recommended.

This is "Hedgeswarm", a 3d space shooter game where you clear an asteroid field from the self-replicating machine outbreak that has caught on in the area. If you are not fast enough, these machines will grow too large to be stopped, and it will be too late for the universe. 

Created for the 36th Godot Wild Jam.
